message: Stephen - Great article. I have a specific question. I have a working code to generate thumbnail for DOCX documents and it involves intermediate step of converting the DOCX to PDF and then to a JPEG. This whole process takes anywhere from 10 to 15 seconds and I do not want to block the calling application because thumbnail generation can be done in background and user does not need to see it immediately. Thumbnail generation is done on a different server. I do not want the calling thread to wait until thumbnail is generated. What are my options here?
